unnormalised: Arre yaar, dor mhoineak electricity bill polleun mhaka heart attack yeta! Fattlea mhoineak ₹3500 aslem, hea mhoineak atancheanuch ₹4200 zalam ani adhunuch 15 tarik! Hea rate-an, mhaka mazi kidney vikun bills bhortali. Konnak tori khobor asa kai kitleak poddteli slightly used kidney? Mhajea eka ixtta khatir vicharta, obvious asa. Ani BSNL broadband? Mhaka startuch naka korunk... ₹899 'unlimited' data khatir jem 50GB uprant throttle zata. Comedy show chalu asa kai?
normalised: Arre yaar, dor mhoineak electricity bill polleun maka heart attack yeta! Fattlea mhoineak teen hazar panchshe rupiya asle, hea mhoineak zaten char hazar don she rupiya zalea ani atam pandhra tarikuch asa! Hya rate-an, maka maaji kidney vikun bill bhorche padtele. Konnak khobor asa kai maka thodishi vaparaleli kidney kitleak podtle mhunn? Evondda mhunn sangta. Ani B-S-N-L broadband? Maka startuch naka korunk... aath she nabbai nabbai rupiya 'unlimited' dataak zaka fifty gigabyte-anchea uprant throttle korta. Comedy show cholta kai hanga?
text: Arre yaar, dor mhoineak electricity bill polleun mhaka heart attack yeta! Fattlea mhoineak ₹3500 aslem, hea mhoineak atancheanuch ₹4200 zalam ani adhunuch 15 tarik! Hea rate-an, mhaka mazi kidney vikun bills bhortali. Konnak tori khobor asa kai kitleak poddteli slightly used kidney? Mhajea eka ixtta khatir vicharta, obvious asa. Ani BSNL broadband? Mhaka startuch naka korunk... ₹899 'unlimited' data khatir jem 50GB uprant throttle zata. Comedy show chalu asa kai?
